{'title': 'Engineering Lead - Customer Area', 'company': 'Adyen', 'location': 'not found', 'description': 'About the job
            

            
                
                  This is AdyenAdyen provides payments, data, and financial products in a single solution for customers like Meta, Uber, H&M, and Microsoft - making us the financial technology platform of choice. At Adyen, everything we do is engineered for ambition.For our teams, we create an environment with opportunities for our people to succeed, backed by the culture and support to ensure they are enabled to truly own their careers. We are motivated individuals who tackle unique technical challenges at scale and solve them as a team. Together, we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that help businesses achieve their ambitions faster.Engineering Lead - Customer Area We are seeking an experienced and visionary, customer obsessed leader to manage and grow a set of high-performing teams responsible for developing and scaling the Customer Area platform at Adyen. This platform is the central interface where merchants can efficiently manage payment, financial, and data workflows in one place.What You Will DoAs the Engineering Lead for the Customer Area, your primary focus will be to drive innovation, scalability, and exceptional user experiences by-      Unifying management- Ensuring merchants have a seamless portal to manage their entire Adyen product suite;Streamlining usability- Creating a consistent, intuitive design and navigation experience across all functionalities;Enhancing self-service- Empowering merchants to complete tasks independently at scale through self-service tools;Global adaptability- Delivering localized experiences that meet regional needs, such as translations, time zones, currencies, payment methods, legal documents, and region-specific features (e.g., tipping, donations, and gift cards);AI-Driven innovation- Leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing to create smarter, more personalized, and intuitive experiences for merchants. Examples include AI-powered search to help merchants find what they need faster or predictive analytics that offer actionable insights tailored to their business;Scalability and resilience- Building a platform that evolves to support diverse merchant needs while maintaining performance and reliability.
Who You Are      A proven leader with experience managing and mentoring high-performing engineering teams, including managing managers, with a track record of delivering complex, scalable platforms;Skilled in building large-scale, distributed systems, ideally with expertise in Java or similar programming languages, and a passion for software architecture, scalability, and maintainability;Experienced in leveraging AI, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing to drive innovation and deliver smarter, more intuitive, and predictive solutions that enhance user experiences;You like to keep things simple, love dealing with uncertainty and get things done. You are a great story teller, and are comfortable talking to tech & non-tech, as well as merchants and internal stakeholders from every part of the business;You’re curious about what our biggest merchants are facing and empathetic to solving problems that help all merchants.
Our Diversity, Equity and Inclusion commitments Our unique approach is a product of our diverse perspectives. This diversity of backgrounds and cultures is essential in helping us maintain our momentum. Our business and technical challenges are unique, and we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them - voices like yours. No matter who you are or where you’re from, we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen.Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100% of the qualifications. Does this sound like you? If so, Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply. We look forward to your application!What’s next?Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us. We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 5 business days. Our interview process tends to take about 4 weeks to complete, but may fluctuate depending on the role. Learn more about our hiring process here. Don’t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility.This role is based out of our Amsterdam or Madrid office. We are an office-first company and value in-person collaboration; we do not offer remote-only roles.', 'about_company': 'Adyen (AMS: ADYEN) is the financial technology platform of choice for leading companies. By providing end-to-end payments capabilities, data-driven insights, and financial products in a single global solution, Adyen helps businesses achieve their ambitions faster. With offices around the world, Adyen works with the likes of Meta, Uber, H&M, eBay, and Microsoft.For support visit: https://support.adyen.com
      
          
              …
            
              show more'}

{'title': 'Head of Engineering - Merch Platform & ERP', 'company': 'Monday Merch', 'location': 'not found', 'description': 'About the job
            

            
                
                  Location: On-Site - Rotterdam, Netherlands (Relocation Support Available)Employment Type: Full-timeSalary: €5,000 - €6,000 gross/month. We’re growing fast, you grow with us.About the RoleAre you a hands-on engineering leader who thrives in fast-paced environments? Do you want to build and scale cutting-edge software that powers a rapidly growing company?Monday Merch is revolutionizing branded merchandise, combining automation, AI, and smart platforms to streamline everything from design to delivery. As Head of Engineering, you will take full ownership of our technology, guiding a team of engineers while remaining actively involved in development. Your mission is to drive technical excellence, scalability, and innovation—ensuring our platform continues to redefine the merch industry.What You’ll Do      Lead and Build – Set the technical direction while contributing hands-on to key projects across backend, frontend, and infrastructure.Turn Strategy into Execution – Translate long-term company goals into daily engineering tasks, ensuring the team moves efficiently towards our vision.Mentor and Elevate the Team – Support and coach a team of seven engineers (including remote members), fostering best practices in clean code, architecture, and AI-supported development.Optimize and Scale – Improve performance, security, and maintainability across our tech stack as we scale rapidly.Innovate with AI and Automation – Leverage large language models (LLMs) and automation to enhance productivity and reduce manual coding efforts.Own Key Products:Merch Platform (Vue) – Custom-built for seamless client engagement.Shop (Nuxt) – A highly dynamic e-commerce experience.ERP (Python/Odoo) – The engine that keeps our operations running.
Our Tech Stack      Backend: Python (Odoo ERP)Frontend: Vue.js & Nuxt 3Infrastructure: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)AI & Automation: Large Language Models (LLMs) for code assistanceWorkflow: GitHub + Linear
What We’re Looking For      5+ years of professional experience in software engineering, with a strong background in both frontend and backend development.Full-stack proficiency, with deep expertise in Python (Odoo) and Vue/Nuxt 3.Leadership mindset with experience mentoring or managing engineers, with a passion for helping teams grow.Systematic and structured approach, balancing high-level strategy with day-to-day execution.Excited about using AI, automation, and LLMs to optimize development workflows.Strong communication skills, able to convey technical ideas effectively across teams and stakeholders.', 'about_company': 'Your all-in-one merch partner. Organising company merchandise is hard and time-consuming. Let us handle it for you: design, production, storage, and global shipping.Get started with free designs in 24 hours now!
      
          
              …
            
              show more'}

{'title': 'Product Manager - Internal Cloud Services', 'company': 'Adyen', 'location': 'not found', 'description': "About the job
            

            
                
                  This is AdyenAdyen provides payments, data, and financial products in a single solution for customers like Meta, Uber, H&M, and Microsoft - making us the financial technology platform of choice. At Adyen, everything we do is engineered for ambition.For our teams, we create an environment with opportunities for our people to succeed, backed by the culture and support to ensure they are enabled to truly own their careers. We are motivated individuals who tackle unique technical challenges at scale and solve them as a team. Together, we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that help businesses achieve their ambitions faster.Product Manager, Internal Cloud ServicesThe Platform Engineering group is building Platform as a Product that can enable engineers to autonomously build and support secure, scalable, and reliable applications with high speed and quality through a common technology ecosystem. This ecosystem must always be available, so our merchants can always process payments. Our products and services enable the growth of our core business while helping engineers deliver faster with self-service tools that provide an amazing developer experience.Within Platform Engineering, the Adyen Cloud Services (ACS) teams provide the building blocks (infrastructure, platforms and services) that enable our IDP (Internal Developer Portal) and shared application capabilities to run in a scalable, secure and reliable way.What You'll Do      Working closely with the engineering counterparts and leadership, you will be responsible for scaling the most impactful infrastructure building blocks of the Adyen Cloud Service.Dive deep into understanding problems and prioritize which ones to solve, ensuring that imminent issues are resolved first and the long term is also taken care of.Focus on defining the product strategy and the team's roadmap, executing the strategy, and ensuring all teams and stakeholders are aligned.Interact regularly with infrastructure engineers, software developers, product managers, and the leadership teams from other departments.Guide cross-functional teams to establish a roadmap with feasible and measurable goals.Closely collaborate with your peers to discover opportunities to improve the overall engineering experience and drive decision making.Deliver products across the finish line with engineers, infrastructure teams, internal stakeholders, and product peers.
Who You Are      At least 3 years of experience as a Product Manager and delivered successful outcomes.Someone with a good technical understanding to formulate problems to solve with your technical counterparts, and also the ability to zoom out and ask the right questions to guide decision making.You have a good conceptual understanding of platforms and infrastructure, are aware of industry trends and how infrastructure can enable and scale the overall performance of a company. Good understanding on how to move towards standardization and unification of services to drive efficiency. Knowledgeable on what is needed to drive decisions with the team, considering business and technical needs.Fueled by curiosity, always on the lookout to learn how something works, whether it's our platform's performance, application architecture, or the scalability of our products.A strong communicator and are able to challenge the status quo to drive positive change. Someone that promotes strong teamwork, healthy collaboration, and inclusivity, with a growth mindset and the thirst to learn and build great products.
Our Diversity, Equity and Inclusion commitments Our unique approach is a product of our diverse perspectives. This diversity of backgrounds and cultures is essential in helping us maintain our momentum. Our business and technical challenges are unique, and we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them - voices like yours. No matter who you are or where you’re from, we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen.Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100% of the qualifications. Does this sound like you? If so, Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply. We look forward to your application!What’s next?Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us. We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 5 business days. Our interview process tends to take about 4 weeks to complete, but may fluctuate depending on the role. Learn more about our hiring process here. Don’t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility.This role is primarily based out of our Amsterdam office and will also require some travel to our offices in Chicago.We are an office-first company and value in-person collaboration; we do not offer remote-only roles.", 'about_company': 'Adyen (AMS: ADYEN) is the financial technology platform of choice for leading companies. By providing end-to-end payments capabilities, data-driven insights, and financial products in a single global solution, Adyen helps businesses achieve their ambitions faster. With offices around the world, Adyen works with the likes of Meta, Uber, H&M, eBay, and Microsoft.For support visit: https://support.adyen.com
